title: My Sunshine
overview: Zhao Mo Sheng is a university student with a sunny disposition, she's smart, and has a positive personality. Upon their first meeting, she fell in love with He Yi Chen, one of the top students from the Law faculty. However, his poor communication skill, makes her depart sadly for overseas. Seven years later, Zhao Mo Sheng returns home and spots him immediately in a crowded supermarket. Will the two college sweethearts be able to reunite?
